thread.title: BBC Question Time: Suzanne Evans Roasted For 'Distasteful' Joke About Scotland
thread.title_full: BBC Question Time: Suzanne Evans Roasted For 'Distasteful' Joke About Scotland

author: Chris York
title: BBC Question Time: Suzanne Evans Roasted For 'Distasteful' Joke About Scotland
text:
BBC Question Time: Suzanne Evans Roasted For 'Distasteful' Joke About Scotland 'Not a fecking clue.' 28/03/2017 12:40 Chris York Senior Editor, Huffington Post UK 
Ukip’s Suzanne Evans riled a few Scots during last night’s Question Time Brexit special with what was either an ill-judged joke or a complete misunderstanding of Scottish history.
